title: The Sign-Rank of AC^O.
abstract: The sign-rank of a matrix A = [A ij ] with plusmn1 entries is the least rank of a real matrix B = [B ij ] with A ij B ij  > 0 for all i, j. We obtain the first exponential lower bound on the sign-rank of a function in AC 0 . Namely, let f(x, y) = Lambda i=1   m  Lambda j=1   m   2 (x ij  Lambda y ij ). We show that the matrix [f(x, y)] x,   y  has sign-rank 2 Omega(m) .
